title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 601.5 - Submission, approval and effect of local laws or ordinances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 601.5 - Submission, approval and effect of local laws or ordinances

State Regulations
(a) Local laws or
ordinances adopted to implement harbor management plans shall be submitted to
the secretary with the completed LWRP. (b) Such local laws or ordinances shall be
approved and become effective as provided in section
922
of the

Executive Law and Part 603 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
601.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
